title: Buying an extra rune page
body: I am wanting to buy an extra rune page, but I am not sure if this is a bug or has been temporarily disabled. I cannot seem to find the option to bit an extra rune page. I have looked everywhere thinking that maybe it was moved.

replies.body:
Hey there guys,

Sorry about this, I'm not 100% sure as to whether or not this is intentional, but here's the problem and how to fix it.

There's a dropdown under **Gameplay > Runes** to filter by tier, change this to **Show All** and the option to buy additional rune pages should become visible.

http://puu.sh/rURf0/4e01ae656d.jpg
Having the same problem - anybody else? Maybe disabling before an end of season sale?{{sticker:zombie-brand-mindblown}}
